Package presentationLayer

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • presentationLayer.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class View
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is used to implement the UI of the application
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Label that shows the calculated price if a model, engine, transmission and seats is selected in the combo boxes

      Button that resets the view to the start configuration (selected model, engine, transmission and seats are null)

    • Field Detail

      • comboBoxModels

        private final javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> comboBoxModels
        Combo box showing all selectable models

      • comboBoxEngines

        private final javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> comboBoxEngines
        Combo box showing all selectable engines according to the selected model. If no model is selected, all engines are shown.

      • comboBoxTransmissions

        private final javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> comboBoxTransmissions
        Combo box showing all selectable transmissions according to the selected model. If no model is selected, all transmissions are shown.

      • comboBoxSeats

        private final javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> comboBoxSeats
        Combo box showing all selectable seats according to the selected model. If no model is selected, all seats are shown.

      • priceResult

        private final javax.swing.JLabel priceResult
        Label that shows the calculated price if a model, engine, transmission and seats is selected in the combo boxes

      • messages

        private final javax.swing.JLabel messages
        Message box that shows input hints to the user. Messages could be: "Eine oder mehrere Optionen sind fÃ¼r dieses Modell nicht verfÃ¼gbar. Bitte eine neue Option wÃ¤hlen." if the user changed a model after selecting suboptions and those suboptions are not available anymore, or "Bitte wÃ¤hlen Sie eine Fahrzeugkonfiguration aus" if there are still combo boxes empty

      • resetButton

        private final javax.swing.JButton resetButton
        Button that resets the view to the start configuration (selected model, engine, transmission and seats are null)

      • setPriceResult

        public void setPriceResult​(java.lang.Integer price)
        Sets the price label to the calculated price or to null if not all combo boxes are set. Adds the euro sign and the thousands separator to the number
        Parameters:
        price - calculated price for the selected options in the combo boxes or null if not all combo boxes are set

      • setMessageText

        public void setMessageText​(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the label messages to a text
        Parameters:
        text - to be shown in the label 'messages'

      • isMessageBoxEmpty

        public boolean isMessageBoxEmpty()
        Checks if the label 'messages' is empty or not. If it is empty, it opens the possibility to set a new content into it.
        Returns:
        true if the content of the label 'messages' is null or empty. Else returns false.

      • setDefaultBackgroundComboBoxEngines

        public void setDefaultBackgroundComboBoxEngines()
        Changes the background color of the combo box 'comboBoxEngines' to the default color. The background color of the combo box 'comboBoxModels' is never changed, so it picks the background color from there

      • setDefaultBackgroundComboBoxTransmissions

        public void setDefaultBackgroundComboBoxTransmissions()
        Changes the background color of the combo box 'comboBoxTransmissions' to the default color. The background color of the combo box 'comboBoxModels' is never changed, so it picks the background color from there

      • setDefaultBackgroundComboBoxSeats

        public void setDefaultBackgroundComboBoxSeats()
        Changes the background color of the combo box 'comboBoxSeats' to the default color. The background color of the combo box 'comboBoxModels' is never changed, so it picks the background color from there

      • addModelSelectionListener

        public void addModelSelectionListener​(java.awt.event.ItemListener listenForComboBox)
        Adds an item listener to the combo box 'comboBoxModels'
        Parameters:
        listenForComboBox - item listener (inner class of the controller)

      • update

        public void update​(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Called if one of the models 'AvailableConfiguration' or 'SelectedConfiguration' has changed. Updates the combo boxes and the price labels accoring to the new values
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - Observable (object of the class 'AvailableConfiguration' or 'SelectedConfiguration')
        arg - argument (object of the class 'AvailableConfiguration' or 'SelectedConfiguration')
